# Copilot Instructions for Endless Love Wedding Website

## Project Overview
This is a single-page wedding website for Azeezat & Afeez's Nikkah ceremony (January 31, 2026). Built as a static React application using modern web technologies.

## Architecture
- **Framework**: Vite + React 18 + TypeScript
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS with custom design system (royal purple, metallic gold, warm cream)
- **UI Components**: shadcn/ui with Radix UI primitives
- **Animations**: Framer Motion for smooth transitions
- **Routing**: React Router (minimal usage - mainly for 404 handling)
- **State**: React Query for data fetching (though minimal in this static site)

## Component Structure
- `src/components/wedding/` - Wedding-specific sections (HeroSection, LoveStorySection, etc.)
- `src/components/ui/` - Reusable shadcn/ui components
- `src/pages/` - Route components (Index, NotFound)
- `src/lib/` - Utilities (utils.ts)
- `src/hooks/` - Custom hooks (use-mobile, use-toast)

## Design System
### Colors (HSL values)
- Primary: Deep royal purple (270 65% 35%)
- Accent: Metallic gold (43 74% 53%)
- Background: Warm cream (40 20% 97%)
- Custom variables: `--gold`, `--purple-deep`, `--cream`

### Typography
- Headings: Cormorant Garamond serif
- Body: Lato sans-serif
- Applied via Tailwind font classes: `font-serif`, `font-sans`

### Animations
- Framer Motion for entrance animations (`initial`, `animate`, `whileInView`)
- Custom keyframes: `float`, `shimmer`, `pulse-glow`, `fade-up`
- Utility classes: `animate-float`, `animate-shimmer`, `text-gradient-gold`

## Key Patterns
### Component Structure
```tsx
const SectionComponent = () => {
  return (
    <motion.section
      initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 30 }}
      whileInView={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
      viewport={{ once: true }}
      transition={{ duration: 0.8 }}
      className="py-24 px-6"
    >
      {/* Content */}
    </motion.section>
  );
};
```

### Styling Conventions
- Use semantic color tokens: `text-primary`, `bg-secondary`, `border-accent`
- Custom shadows: `shadow-soft`, `shadow-elevated`, `shadow-gold-glow`
- Responsive design with `md:`, `lg:` prefixes
- Islamic-inspired aesthetic with elegant, luxurious feel

### Path Aliases
- `@/` resolves to `src/` (configured in `vite.config.ts`)

## Development Workflow
- `npm run dev` - Start development server on port 8080
- `npm run build` - Production build
- `npm run build:dev` - Development build
- `npm run lint` - ESLint checking
- `npm run preview` - Preview production build

## Specific Conventions
- Wedding sections follow naming: `{Feature}Section.tsx`
- RSVP handled via WhatsApp links (no forms/backend)
- Countdown timer in HeroSection uses hardcoded wedding date
- Components use `motion.div` from framer-motion extensively
- Custom CSS classes defined in `src/index.css` for gradients and animations

## File Organization
- Keep wedding components in `src/components/wedding/`
- UI components auto-generated by shadcn in `src/components/ui/`
- Avoid modifying shadcn components directly - extend via composition
- Use TypeScript interfaces for component props

## Deployment
- Static site deployable to any hosting (Netlify, Vercel, etc.)
- Built via Lovable platform (see README for details)
- No environment variables or backend required
